rules_text:
Deathtouch
When you salvage this card onto a permanent you control, put a deathtouch counter on that permanent.
Salvage {4}{B} [i]({4}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature or Vehicle. Salvage only as a sorcery.)[/i]
